alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rooks, southern Smith, northwestern Osborne and southeastern Phillips Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Kirwin to 6 miles northeast of Alton. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Smith Center, Kensington, Agra, Kirwin, Gaylord, Athol, Harlan and Cedar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
